articles.title: D4vd tour dates removed from websites after the discovery of a girl’s body in Los Angeles - CNN
articles.description: The last two remaining dates in singer d4vd’s US tour and multiple stops in his upcoming European tour have been removed from ticketing websites, as authorities continue to investigate the discovery of the decomposed body of a teenage girl in Los Angeles.
